content: Ministry of health and family welfare India has put a report for comments in public domain. The report named " National Digital Health Blueprint " lays down the vision for digital health for India. FHIR is proposed as data exchange standard. A great achievement for FHIR community.
@Nagesh Bashyam @Grahame Grieve Just in May at HL7 WGM we were talking about scope of FHIR in India and here it is ..
